Bloomington.Braemar Ice Rink: Braemar Ice Rink, better known as Braemar Arena, is a multisheet (three sheets) ice hockey rink located in Edina, Minnesota. The complex has three rinks named for their relative location on the complex, from oldest to newest: West, East and South. Braemar is home to the Edina High School boys' (12-time state champions), and girls' hockey teams, as well as a number of figure skating and City of Edina hockey leagues.
